siteMetadata.title: Youtube 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt:
In his post fight interview after stopping Ronald Ellis, young rising star David Benavidez discusses what is next for him, including eying big names like Jermall Charlo, Caleb Plant, and Canelo Alvarez. Plus, he gives himself a grade and talks about his performance against a tough Ellis. 

#ShoSports #ShowtimeChampionshipBoxing #DavidBenavidez #RonaldEllis

Subscribe to the SHOWTIME Sports YouTube channel: https://goo.gl/s8CWVT

localize.title: 大卫-贝纳维德兹说，在战胜埃利斯后，他 "现在就可以打败卡内罗-阿尔瓦雷兹"｜SHOWTIME - Powered by Discuz!
localize.description:
在他阻止罗纳德-埃利斯后的赛后采访中，年轻的新星大卫-贝纳维德兹讨论了他的下一步，包括对Jermall Charlo，Caleb Plant和Canelo Alvarez等大牌的觊觎。另外，他给自己打分，并谈论他对强硬的埃利斯的表现。

#ShoSports#ShowtimeChampionshipBoxing#DavidBenavidez#RonaldEllis。

订阅SHOWTIME体育YouTube频道：https://goo.gl/s8CWVT。

localize.title: 大衛-貝納維德茲說，在戰勝埃利斯後，他 "現在就可以打敗卡內羅-阿爾瓦雷茲"｜SHOWTIME - Powered by Discuz!
